mapper.sql: id, ddmc_amount, jindie_amount, balance, op_status, op_people, op_time, sync, create_time, update_time
mapper.update:
UPDATE finance_bill_collect
ddmc_amount = #{ddmcAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
jindie_amount = #{jindieAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
balance = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
op_status = #{opStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
op_people = #{opPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
op_time = #{opTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sync = #{sync,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
